Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when line number information is available for a serialization error.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This exception is thrown when the serializer encounters an error. This exception allows the serializer to return information about the location and type of the error.
## Examples The following code example throws a CodeDomSerializerException with an example message and a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLinePragma>.
